item.description:
Let's see Steven Spielberg's "Lincoln" starring Daniel Day-Lewis.  The film focuses on the last four months of Lincoln's life, particularly the political collision of Lincoln and the powerful men of his cabinet on the road to abolition and the end of the Civil War.

We will meet in the lobby between 3:15 and 3:25.  We'll be seeing the 3:35 p.m. show.  Please note that this film is 2 hours 29 minutes.

Click the image below to be taken to the Official Lincoln Movie site.  Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me, Tammy, in the lobby. I wear glasses; please see my profile for a photo.
item.name: Saturday Afternoon Matinee: "Lincoln" (in Danvers)
